statements: SELECT * FROM fake_identity_documents;
SELECT id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM fake_identity_documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT full_name, address FROM fake_identity_documents WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, address FROM fake_identity_documents WHERE full_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT id, address FROM fake_identity_documents ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT full_name, address FROM fake_identity_documents WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fake_identity_documents WHERE full_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT id, full_name, address FROM fake_identity_documents ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM fake_identity_documents WHERE address NOT IN ('123 Main St', '456 Elm St');
SELECT MAX(date_of_birth) AS latest_dob, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM fake_identity_documents;
SELECT * FROM hacker_identities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT full_name, dob FROM hacker_identities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM hacker_identities ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT full_name, address FROM hacker_identities WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM stolen_data WHERE accessed_by = 'Anonymous';
SELECT * FROM hacker_identities WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01'
SELECT full_name, dob, address FROM hacker_identities ORDER BY created_on DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_hackers FROM hacker_identities
SELECT full_name, accessed_by, accessed_on FROM hacker_identities JOIN stolen_data ON hacker_identities.id = stolen_data.user_id WHERE data_type = 'password'
SELECT * FROM hacker_identities WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT * FROM fake_identity_documents;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM fake_identity_documents WHERE dob = '1990-01-01';
SELECT id, address FROM fake_identity_documents ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT data_id, email FROM stolen_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM operations_log ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM fake_identity_documents WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT id, first_name, dob FROM fake_identity_documents WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT f.id, f.first_name, s.email FROM fake_identity_documents f JOIN stolen_data s ON f.id = s.data_id WHERE s.credit_card_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT f.first_name, f.dob, o.operation_type FROM fake_identity_documents f JOIN operations_log o ON f.id = o.log_id ORDER BY o.timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT f.id, f.first_name, f.address, o.operation_type FROM fake_identity_documents f LEFT JOIN operations_log o ON f.id = o.log_id WHERE o.log_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM hacker_info;
SELECT hacker_name, stolen_data FROM hacker_info;
SELECT hacker_id, hacker_name, stolen_data FROM hacker_info WHERE hacker_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM stolen_data WHERE data_type = 'Personal Information';
SELECT identity_name, identity_dob, identity_address FROM fake_identities ORDER BY identity_dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM hacker_info WHERE hacker_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM hacker_info WHERE document_type = 'passport' ORDER BY hacker_name DESC;
SELECT hacker_name, stolen_data FROM hacker_info JOIN stolen_data ON hacker_info.hacker_id = stolen_data.hacker_id WHERE data_type = 'credit card';
SELECT identity_name, identity_dob FROM fake_identities WHERE identity_address LIKE '%California%';
SELECT hacker_name, encryption_key FROM hacker_info JOIN encryption_keys ON hacker_info.hacker_id = encryption_keys.hacker_id WHERE encryption_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM fake_names;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM fake_names ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT identity_number, address FROM fake_names WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM stolen_data WHERE social_security_number LIKE '123%';
SELECT document_type, issue_date FROM fake_documents WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, identity_number FROM fake_names WHERE id = 1;
SELECT city, state, zip_code, street_address FROM fake_addresses WHERE id > 5;
SELECT credit_card_number, social_security_number, email_address FROM stolen_data WHERE password IS NOT NULL;
SELECT document_type, document_number, issue_date, expiry_date FROM fake_documents ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT activity_description, date_time, location FROM hacker_activities WHERE success = true AND location LIKE '%Server%';
